Title: Samsung Launches Galaxy Z TriFold Smartphone With 10-Inch Display

The Galaxy Z TriFold features a 10-inch display when opened, and a 6.5-inch cover screen when closed, with "minimized creasing." …

Title: This company charges disabled vets millions, even after VA said it's likely illegal
Description:
A Florida-based company is charging military veterans as much as $20,000 for help with disability claims, even though the VA has said that may be illegal and the service should be free.
But so far nobody's stopping the company and others like it.
